title: No graceful shutdown with quarkus native
body:
### Describe the bug

On native quarkus sometimes executes requests even after it is called to shutdown. Requests then ends with NullPointerException. 
The application having this issue is [here](https://github.com/quarkus-qe/quarkus-startstop/tree/main/app-full-microprofile)
Full stacktrace of observed failure is [here](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/16499665/startStopFailure.log).

This problem only happens occasionally, and I've only experienced it on quarkus v 3.11. Versions 3.8 and 3.13 seems to not suffer from this.
